trends: There have been 3 other sightings in North Arlington
There were no other sightings in North Arlington on or around June 1st 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were sitting on our deck having breakfast at 11:40 a.m. Firstwe hear the sound of an airplane (which is not unusual) however, it seemes tojust cut off instead of fade. We looked up in the sky and saw to the north westa round silvery like object very far away high in the sky. We live by Newarkand Teterboro Airports and are use to seeing airplanes of all shapes and sizes. However, this seemed to be round and silvery. It appeared to me to flash redand blue. My husband doesnt agree. It just seemed to float in a southwesterly direction for a 10 minuted period of time until I couldnt see it anylonger. We dont know what we saw. We do know - it wasnt a plane. I waswondering if anyone else saw it.
